column5: Congrats PF  June 5 is a good day... my brothers birthday.  I should be joining the '2 Boy' club in August
Congratulations!
Congrats on a healty son Steve.
Congrats to you and your family! I have only two words of advice for you... DIAPER GENIE!!!!! HH
Fantastic news, congratulations!  Beer & wings huh, your new son is going to fit right in with OFC...    Mike
congrats on the new boy, isnt it the best feeling in the world when you first get to hold your little one.  the best natural high in the world.  jason
Awwww...congrats!!!  The only time I believe in life where love is an INSTANT thing.
Congrats to the whole family Steve
Congrats Steve. All the best to you and the family.
Congrats to you and your family on the birth of your new son!    Whopper
What a darling Steve!!!  Congrats to you and your wife.  Joey
If I was able to marry my Diaper Genie I honestly think I would! and make baby Diaper Genies... LOVE IT!    Gerritt.

Hmmm, beer and wings. You should have somehing very interesting coming out the other end of Carson. Congratulations on having a healthy baby boy. Been a while since we had a baby (ours are 9 & 12 now). Kids are great at every age, but I kind of miss the little ones running around. You lucky devil you   .
Great stuff Steve ! Congrats to you and the Mrs and many happy years as one big family to all of you.
AWESOME Steve. Congratulations!
Steve,congrats on the new Baby.  Steve
Congratulations, you get instant hero status. My baby boy turned 16 this year, so my hero status has been declining for years now. LOL Enjoy, it really does go by fast.
Atta boy Steve!!!

Hey Guys,  We just got in from the hospital.  Got let out overnight based on some criteria given to us by the pediatrician.  We are all to be back by 9:30 tomorow morning for some tests to see if we stay out or get re-admitted.  DANG.  Boy has got to put on some weight overnight...We will be working hard with him so that we can come back home tomorow.  Everyone is healthy and happy, just have to get the weight of Carson up to a good level.

Today PigeonFisher and his wife are expecting! Awesome news! Congrats! it was a planned C-Section.. I told Steve I would say a little prayer for mom and baby in hope that everything will go without a hitch!  I hope Mom and Baby are doing well as are the nerves of Dad   What is the little fellas name?  What did he weigh in at?  Hows Mom (Christine) doing?  And how is mini Coop handling it?  Again brother congrats cant wait to hear from you and your wife!   Gerritt.
..and does he look more like Gerritt or me??
Congrats to Pigeonfisher and his wife!   Tell us all about him/her.
If the kid is good look,n,well it aint mine.LOL Congrats you crusty bugger.
That's number two, right?

Nope... Not until about 8:00 am tomorow.  This is a strange feeling.  Kristi had about 44 hours of very hard labour last time.  The last 12 were just terrible, the result was many months of agony.  We expect this times planning will allow us to really enjoy the summer and that the new one will be healthier and happier for his first few months.  With any luck I will get a report back to you all tomorow with weights and toe counts, etc...  A real Gentleman, Roy Boudreau once told me something while we shared a drink at his kitchen table.  "You don't know what love is until you have children"...I agree.  Carson Steven Crooks, we so patiently await your arrival.  Your brother has made your Mom and I two of the happiest folks on earth and we know that you will follow in his footsteps.  Our love will be shared with you from your first day until our last!  See ya tomorow, Pal!!!
right on Steve & Kristi - I remember how excited you were a coupla month before Coop arrived - hoping all goes well tommorow  We are patiently awaiting the arrivial of our first (fall)
Congrats Steve and all the best to you and yours...  I hope all goes well tomorrow...
All the best Crooks family!
That's great news Steve. Bring us back a pic of the little guy.
Good luck guys, looking forward to the report of a safe healthy arrival.  All the best.
Good luck!!  We're expecting baby boy #3 any day now....and the feelings you expressed about having kids in right on the mark!  Best of luck.... dk

Carson was born at 8:45 on June 05.  Mom and Baby are recovering well and will be coming home tomorow.  6lbs 11oz.  Little man has some hair and made a strange request this morning for wings and beer.  You should have seen the look on the nurses face!!!      Hope you guys are all doing well, and thanks for the well wishes.
Very Nice Congrats
Congratulations on your beautiful baby boy!!!  Ahh wings and beer...the food of champions, he'll weigh much more than 6.11 if he follows that diet  lol  Glad to hear everyone is doing well    Bly
Awesome!!! Good thing he looks like MOM!   Welcome to the world and OFC Carson!  Make sure that wife of yours takes it easy, she needs her rest and time to heal   Gerritt.
congrats Crooks's!
Congratulations!
Congratulations, very good looking little guy.  Start him on mild wings though - the hot ones can burn holes in the pampers.
Congrats to you and the Mrs. He's a cute little fella...I hope you have a rod and reel for him  Maureen
Congrat's to the Crooks's. Remember to enjoy every moment. Don't rush the first wing Steve, it'll come soon enough. Time has a habit of flying by and picks up momentum as each year passes.  John..
Congrats Steve and to your wife and family! That hospital doesn`t have OFC hats?
congrats!!
New life is the best news in the whole world.  Congratulations to Steve, Kristi and the Mighty Coop.
